message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. I'm willing to make a deal, but I have to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $7,000 is unfortunately too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to make at least $9,000 to make this worthwhile. How about $9,500?  It's still a good deal for you, considering the value of the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8,500?
